animal.question: I say "Meow!" and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft fur and whiskers.

animal.question: I wag my tail and bark! Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I eat seeds and bugs.
🪶 I have feathers and a bill.
💧 I love to swim in water.

animal.question: I say "Moo!" and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in the field.
🐄 I am a farm animal.
🥛 People drink my milk.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big and gray.
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I have a mane and roar loudly! Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am the king of the jungle.
☀️ I have golden fur.
🗣️ You can hear my roar far away.

animal.question: I hop around and eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love orange vegetables.
🐰 I have long ears.
🐾 I have a fluffy tail.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I live in the jungle.
🙉 I make funny faces.
🍌 I peel my snack before eating it.

animal.question: I am black and white and like to eat bamboo. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐼 I live in China.
🌿 I eat lots of green plants.
🐻 I look like a bear.

animal.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🐢 I live on land or in the sea.
🛡️ My home is on my back.

transport.question: I go on the road and have four wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Grown ups use me to travel
🎶 I can play music while I move
🚦 I stop at red lights

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can be big or small
⚓ I need water to move
🐟 I am often used for holidays.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly high above the clouds.
💺 People sit inside me.
🌎 I can take you to another country.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
📣 I often make a loud noise.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people can ride together in me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to move. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I'm good exercise
🔔 I have a bell to ring.
🏞️ I am great for riding in parks.

transport.question: I'm like a car but I can carry lots of people around town. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick people up.
🗺️ I follow a special route.
🏢 Many people ride me to get to work or school.

transport.question: I'm like a boat but I go under the water! What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I can go very deep
🌊 People wear special equipment inside me
🐠 I am used to explore the sea.

transport.question: I fly, but I have spinning blades on top instead of wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one spot.
🚨 Emergency workers use me.
🏥 I can rescue people!

transport.question: I am very fast and can travel to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I need a countdown before I launch.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride me.
🪐 I can travel to other planets.

transport.question: I'm like a motorcycle, but you stand up while riding me on snowy mountains. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am useful in the snow.
🧤 People wear helmets and gloves when they ride me.
⛰️ I can travel up steep hills on a mountain.
